node.text:
In April 2002, RIEDEL introduced their glass for Tequila, designed to highlight the finest characteristics of Mexico’s national drink. 

Designated the Official Tequila Glass by the Consejo Regulador del Tequila, this glass was designed to enhance Mexico’s finest Reposados, Añejos and Reservas de Casa Tequilas. 

The glass was designed at two tasting workshops led by Georg Riedel and attended by over two dozen Tequila producers, officials and cognoscenti, using twelve 100% Agave Tequila Reposado, aged eight months, including Don Julio’s Tres Magueyes and Casa Noble’s Cofradia.

It gives you the elegant experience that Tequila deserves! #RIEDEL

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE.  We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: Maximilian Riedel discusses his favourite spirit: Tequila!

node.text:
Discover the philosophy of Grape Varietal Specific glasses with the RIEDEL Tasting Sets. The functionality of our glasses is most clearly visible in a comparative tasting, and each set includes three to four different grape varietal specific glasses to allow you to compare the experience of the same wine in different shapes.

Each one of these glasses have been developed in a RIEDEL Sensory Workshop to suit the characteristics of the grape variety, based on knowledge developed over the last three generations of the Riedel family. 

The RIEDEL Tasting Sets are available at RIEDEL.com, and are the perfect gift for anyone who loves wine and wants to take their knowledge and enjoyment to the next level. #RIEDEL

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE.  We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: Discover the key to wine with RIEDEL Tasting Sets

node.text:
Get tips from 11th generation @maxiriedel on the best way to polish and take care of your #RIEDEL glasses.

All our glasses are dishwasher safe - we recommend MIELE as the best machine.

If you want to give them a final polish by hand, we only ever use our RIEDEL Polishing Cloths for a perfect result. Shop them now via RIEDEL.com or your local retailer.

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE.  We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: How to polish your RIEDEL glasses

node.text:
As our second most popular series, the success of “O” is easy to understand: casual, contemporary and space-saving, it’s perfect for those who crave elegant and uncomplicated products for everyday use.

11th generation @maxiriedel discusses its versatility, why it’s practical for every day, and answers the most common customer question: won’t my wine warm up more quickly in a stemless glass? Watch to find out!

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE.  We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: RIEDEL “O" - The Original Stemless Wine Tumbler

node.text:
Over 20 years ago, #Hennessy asked RIEDEL to help them find the ideal glass for cognac. The cooperation led to the development of a glass that demanded a new way of thinking from traditional cognac lovers.

Hennessy now strongly recommends the use of the slender and functional glass that RIEDEL offers to the market; find out how and why it works with 11th generation @maxiriedel. #RIEDEL

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.title: The development of the RIEDEL Cognac glass

Why is decanting such an important part of wine enjoyment? How long should a wine be decanted, and what’s the best procedure? Find out this and more from @maxiriedel in our latest video! #RIEDEL

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.text:
Discover more about the history of champagne glasses and learn how to best serve your favourite champagne. What’s the difference between the coupe, the flute, and the wine glass, when it comes to delivery of aroma and flavour? 11th generation Maximilian Riedel takes you through the options to show you how to get more from the wines you love. #RIEDEL

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.text:
Who says you should save cocktails for the weekend? 
​
​This cocktail by @my_cocktail_bible is called the Jungle Cat and looks absolutely incredible in our Drink Specific Glassware Rocks glass. Check out the recipe below!
​
40ml St Clements Gin @cardiffdistillery
40ml Campari
40ml Fresh Pineapple Juice
12.5ml Fresh Lime Juice
7.5ml Welsh Honey Syrup
2 Dashes of Bob's Orange & Mandarin Bitters
Garnish with Luxardo Maraschino Cherry & Pineapple Fronds 

Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice and shake. Double strain into a rocks glass filled with ice, and garnish with the maraschino cherry and pineapple fronds. Enjoy 👌
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.text:
Another sneak peek behind the scenes at our handmade factory in Kufstein, Austria! 🧐
​
​Our experienced team are replacing a melting pot, which is used to melt the raw materials we use to produce our high quality crystal glass. The pot has to be replaced regularly to ensure the safety of our workers and to maintain the quality of our products.
​
​Fun fact: this was one of our more difficult videos to shoot due to the incredible heat from the melting pot 🔥 Our iPhone overheated three times during the process, which gives you an understanding of the intense conditions and precise skill of our workers to undertake such a task. 👏

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by RIEDEL The Wine Glass Company on July 15, 2021.

node.text:
It is an incredible honour to be celebrating 265 Years of RIEDEL in 2021, but the origin of our craft dates back much further.
​
Blown glass practices were first recorded ​2000 years ago somewhere along the Syro-Palestinian coast, and our techniques today are not largely dissimilar to that which was first used. 
​
​Heated in a furnace, molten glass is collected on the end of a hollow pipe, inflated to a bubble, and formed into shape by blowing organically or into a mold. Additional features like the stem and base are then affixed and shaped as required.
​
​Let's raise a glass to this incredibly old craft! ✨ #RIEDEL

​At #RIEDEL, we produce handmade glass at our factory in Kufstein, Austria. ✨ Each handmade item is individually crafted by our master glassmakers.

​The skill and expertise of these craftspeople guarantees that the quality of each glass meets the high standard for which our brand is known. Do you own a #RIEDELHandmade product? 🍷

node.text:
Here's a funny coincidence... World Rum Day (10 July) is the day before World Mojito Day (11 July). Surely that means this weekend deserves a Mojito!
​
​☀️ MOJITO ☀️
 
6 cl / 60ml / 2 fl. oz. (US) white rum
2 cl / 20ml / 0.7 fl. oz. (US) fresh lime juice
2 bar spoons brown cane sugar
5 cl / 50ml / 1.7 fl. oz. (US) soda water
5-10 g / 0.18 - 0.35 oz. (US) mint
Crushed ice
Sprigs of mint

Preparation:

Place the mint leaves in a #RIEDEL Shadow Tumbler then add rum, sugar and lime juice. Stir vigorously, pressing down on the mint as you do so. Add crushed ice to the tumbler and stir again. Top up with soda and garnish with sprigs of mint. 
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

node.text:
Why should you ditch the flute for the glass? 🥂
​
​In the words of @maxiriedel, "Champagne is a wine and deserves to be treated as such.  Whether enjoying a Blanc de Blancs or a Cuvée, our Champagne wine glass allows the range of aromas of Champagne to unfold in a way which is not possible with a narrow flute."
​
​And it isn't just for champagne, it works beautifully for other sparkling too. Just ask @privatcava - they love to serve their beautiful Cava in a RIEDEL Champagne glass!
​
​🥂 RIEDEL Veritas Champagne Wine Glass
​
​#RIEDEL 📸 : @privatcava @henxhospitalitygroup @pontusjonsen ​
​
​DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly

RIEDEL has succeeded in crafting one custom-made glass which allows these three dimensions of Dom Pérignon to fully express themselves. 🍾🥂
​
​Find out more about our stunning #RIEDEL Dom Pérignon glass at RIEDEL.com!

node.text:
Why do we say that Shape Matters? What does it mean when we talk about "The Key to Wine"?

Here is a peek into how we design and create our products with @maxiriedel and @moetchandon.

We take a line up of different shapes and note how the champagne expresses itself from one glass to another, looking for the most balanced and complete profile of the beverage. This allows us to present the absolute best product for champagne - or any wine variety or spirit - for your enjoyment.

Have you ever experienced the difference a glass makes at one of our events? Share your experience with us below! 

DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE. ​We support and promote the responsible consumption of alcohol. This material is not intended for persons under the legal drinking age or in countries with restricted advertising on alcohol. #drinkresponsibly
